posts.description: How do you learn d3.js? — Medium
posts.extended: I’ve been thinking quite a bit about how people learn d3.js, I don’t mean technical mastery of a useful library, I mean learning the craft enabled by a new tool. Creating data visualizations with d3.

Eva S. Moskowitz defended her Success Academy charter schools on Friday, two days after a group of parents filed a federal complaint accusing the network of discriminating against students with disabilities.
